original: ba shya t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ba shya t'a r'a s'a dha nam /

original: dbang du byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dbang du byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining Tara Who Brings Under Her Control

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: t'am yig las skyes pa'i autpal t'am yig gi dbus su mnan par bsams la /
analyzed: t'am yig las skyes pa'i autpal t'am yig gi dbus su mnan par bsams la /
translated: One should visualize a lotus arisen from the syllable tam, with the syllable tam in its center.

original: de @132b yongs su gyur pa las 'phags ma sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yon pa na autpa la bsnams shing g-yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa bzang po'i stan la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: de @132b yongs su gyur pa las 'phags ma sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yon pa na autpa la bsnams shing g-yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa bzang po'i stan la bzhugs pa /
translated: That completely transforms into Noble Tara, green in color, holding an utpala in her left hand and granting boons with her right hand, seated on an excellent seat,

original: don yod grub pas dbu brgyan par bsams nas ye shes sems dpa' dang ro gcig tu byas te /
analyzed: don yod grub pas dbu brgyan par bsams nas ye shes sems dpa' dang ro gcig tu byas te /
translated: with Amoghasiddhi as her head ornament. Having made her one taste with the wisdom being,üîΩone should recite the mantra with the name of the person to be controlled, as follows:

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re che ge mo'i dbang du gyis shig sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re che ge mo'i dbang du gyis shig sv'a h'a /
translated: Om Tare Tuttare Ture, bring such-and-such under control, svƒÅhƒÅ.

original: zhes pas bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pas gong du bstan pa'i grangs nges pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pas gong du bstan pa'i grangs nges pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra with the name of the person to be controlled, as taught above, a specific number of times.

original: mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma med kyang autpa las bsgrub bya'i ske bcings te /
analyzed: mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma med kyang autpa las bsgrub bya'i ske bcings te /
translated: Even though there are no signs such as arrows, bind the neck of the victim with an utpala.

original: rang gi lus kyi 'od kyi tshogs kyis de'i lus la bkang ste rang gi dbang du bya ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: rang gi lus kyi 'od kyi tshogs kyis de'i lus la bkang ste rang gi dbang du bya ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o zhes so //
translated: Fill his body with a mass of light from your own body and place him in a place under your control.

original: dbang du byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje myu gus mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dbang du byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje myu gus mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The sadhana of Tara who brings under one's control composed by the master Vajranakha is complete.
